content:
Sure, here's a revised post:

Fun fact: Jean Barrett was the first woman known to have completed the entire journey on the Road to Hana back in 1926. Today, we celebrate women like her and encourage all women to travel and explore the world. Whether it's a solo trip or a journey with your furry friend, PetFriendly has you covered with thousands of pet-friendly accommodations to choose from. Don't let anything hold you back from experiencing the beauty and adventure of the Road to Hana and beyond! #WomensMonth #TravelGoals #PetFriendly 🌺🌴✈️🐶
